title: Luminite Bullet
summaries: The Luminite Bullet is a type of Hardmode, post-Moon Lord bullet crafted from Luminite Bars. The Luminite Bullet can pierce an infinite number of targets. The damage of the Luminite Bullet decreases by 4% for each target it pierces. This can reduce its damage down to 0, making it unable to deal damage but still continues traveling. It will disappear after 1.67 seconds or upon hitting a solid block.
